extracted_information.summary: XITM is a rapidly growing Minority Woman-Owned Small Business IT Firm in Maryland. We deliver strategic IT services and innovative solutions to Federal, State and Commercial customers, specializing in software engineering, integrations, and enterprise-scale implementations. Our expertise combines user-centered design and agile methods to provide secure, impactful solutions for public and private organizations.

locations.full_address: 5052 Dorsey Hall Dr, Ste 203, Ellicott City, MD 21042

specific_differentiators: Hybrid Global Team Structure: Blended onshore/offshore model offering cost-effective solutions while maintaining real-time collaboration.
Public Sector Experience: Delivered solutions for Federal and state agencies, focusing on citizen-facing usability and secure access.
Security & Compliance Expertise: Applications developed in line with NIST standards for data security and risk management.
Cloud-Native & Scalable Architecture: Microservices-based deployments tailored for future-ready expansion and high availability.

extracted_information.summary: XITM is an IT services provider focused on IT staffing and end-to-end product development, aiming to win contracts with the State of Maryland, federal agencies, and the commercial sector. Led by Pushyami Duvvuri, XITM emphasizes excellence, integrity, customer focus, teamwork, and growth, with a mission to deliver staffing solutions and complex projects as a prime contractor.

extracted_information.summary: Capability statement for XITM emphasizing Artificial Intelligence capabilities, including Generative AI (LLMs), MLOps, NLP, BI, IoT, and RPA, with AWS Bedrock deployments and secure LLM applications. Located in Ellicott City, MD; contact information provided.

capabilities.description: Artificial Intelligence capabilities including Generative AI (LLMs), MLOps, NLP, BI, IoT, and RPA; secure LLM applications; deployment in AWS Bedrock.
capabilities.evidence: Generative AI (LLMs); Machine Learning Operations (MLOps); Natural Language Processing; Business Intelligence; Internet of Things (IoT); Robotic Process Automation (RPA). Secure LLM applications in AWS Bedrock environments.

extracted_information.summary: Cloud services provider offering GovCloud IL6 readiness (ATO support), cloud migration, security, enterprise architecture, and governance, with DoD experience. Located in Ellicott City, MD.

capabilities.description: Cloud Migration: Seamless cloud migration journey with a three-phase approach, analyzing migration goals, designing architecture, tailoring a transition sequence, establishing SLAs, and planning for backup, failover, cut-over, release management, and service transition.
capabilities.evidence: Embark on a seamless cloud migration journey with XITM’s three-phase approach. We meticulously analyze our client ‘s migration goals, design state-of-the-art architecture, and tailor a transition sequence for our customer applications. Our team establishes clear Service Level Agreements (SLAs), determine Recovery Point Objective (RPO) and Recovery Time Objective (RTO) requirements, and strategizes for backup, failover, cut-over, release management, and service transition.

capabilities.description: Cloud Security: Proactive security management to safeguard cloud infrastructure against evolving cybersecurity threats, delivering scalable resilience in the cloud.
capabilities.evidence: Cloud Security In a cloud-driven landscape, security is non-negotiable. XITM is dedicated to safeguarding our client’s cloud infrastructure against evolving cybersecurity threats. Our holistic security management solutions provide proactive and scalable resilience in the cloud.

capabilities.description: Cloud Enterprise Architecture: Designing cloud-native architectures to elevate availability and performance, with real-time visibility and cost optimization; IL6 GovCloud environment established for secure federal use.
capabilities.evidence: Cloud Enterprise Architecture Elevate application availability and performance with XITM’s Cloud Enterprise Architecture. Our seasoned cloud architects possess extensive experience in designing cloud-native architectures, ensuring real-time visibility into application performance while optimizing costs. Just as we’ve established a secure cloud environment up to IL6 within GovCloud infrastructure, we empower federal agencies to deliver applications and websites more reliably and securely over the public internet, ensuring an exceptional user experience.

capabilities.description: Cloud Governance: Automated visibility and governance of cloud infrastructure, with focus on value delivery, resource optimization, and cloud security.
capabilities.evidence: Cloud Governance At XITM, we recognize that cloud migration is an ongoing journey that demands diligent monitoring and maintenance. Our solution provides automated visibility, enabling comprehensive monitoring and governance of our client’s cloud infrastructure. We prioritize value delivery, resource optimization, and cloud security, enabling you to focus on your core business objectives while we ensure your cloud ecosystem operates at its peak efficiency.

identity_info.years_of_experience: With over a decade of experience

capabilities.description: Cybersecurity solutions including STIG-based hardening and automation on AWS and Azure using Chef to understand and boost security thresholds and cyber preparedness.
capabilities.evidence: Our cybersecurity solutions offer a clear and strategic way to understand and boost our customer’s security thresholds and cyber preparedness; STIG automation solution using Chef on AWS and Azure environments.

extracted_information.summary: XITM offers Data Analytics & Engineering capabilities, delivering interactive dashboards, data governance, secure data management, and cloud-native analytics for federal and commercial clients.

capabilities.description: Data Analytics & Engineering services including interactive KPIs, dashboards, and dynamic reporting; data governance and security protocols; end-to-end cloud-native data management and analytics; and a microservices architecture to support ML/AI initiatives.
capabilities.evidence: "Dive into a world of rich, interactive Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), executive dashboards, and dynamic reporting tools designed to give our clients a competitive edge."; "Our skilled data scientists leverage Python, PySpark, R, PowerBI, and cloud computing ETL tools to craft and implement tailored analytic solutions, ensuring they align precisely with our customer’s unique business requirements."; "Additionally, XITM excels in deploying end-to-end cloud-native data management and analytic environments, leveraging a microservices architecture."

specific_differentiators: Robust data governance and security protocols
End-to-end cloud-native data management and analytic environments leveraging a microservices architecture

extracted_information.summary: XProtégé Institute of Technology and Management (XITM) specializes in end-to-end ERP implementations, including SAP and Microsoft Dynamics 365 & Power Platform. The company offers global SAP implementations, consulting services, license procurement, and managed services, as well as Dynamics 365 & Power Platform consulting, licensing, implementations, and managed services to enable digital transformation and scalable cloud ERP/CRM solutions.

identity_info.legal_business_name: XProtégé Institute of Technology and Management (XITM)

capabilities.description: Global SAP Implementations: Deployment and integration of SAP solutions across complex, multi-country environments; Consulting Services: Expert guidance to align SAP capabilities with business objectives, optimize processes, and drive digital; License Procurement: Support in selecting and acquiring the right SAP licenses for your organization’s current and future needs; Managed Services: Ongoing system monitoring, maintenance, and optimization to ensure long-term performance, scalability, and compliance.
capabilities.evidence: Global SAP Implementations: Deployment and integration of SAP solutions across complex, multi-country environments. Consulting Services: Expert guidance to align SAP capabilities with business objectives, optimize processes, and drive digital. License Procurement: Support in selecting and acquiring the right SAP licenses for your organization’s current and future needs. Managed Services: Ongoing system monitoring, maintenance, and optimization to ensure long-term performance, scalability, and compliance.

capabilities.description: Microsoft Dynamics 365 & Power Platform – Global Consulting Services, Licenses, Implementations & Managed Services. Services include Global Consulting & Strategy; Implementation Services; License Management; Managed Services.
capabilities.evidence: Microsoft Dynamics 365 & Power Platform – Global Consulting Services, Licenses, Implementations & Managed Services XITM enables organizations to thrive in a digital-first economy through Microsoft Dynamics 365 and Power Platform solutions. Our services include: Global Consulting & Strategy: Tailored advisory to define and implement business processes using Dynamics 365 for Finance, Sales, Customer Service, and more. Implementation Services: End-to-end setup and customization of Dynamics 365 and Power Platform to meet unique operational goals. License Management: Assistance in identifying, procuring, and managing Microsoft licensing for optimal value and compliance. Managed Services: Continuous support, enhancements, and platform management to keep your Dynamics 365 environment agile and secure.

extracted_information.summary: Capability statement for XITM detailing IT sustainment, cybersecurity, RMF support, accreditation assistance, enhancement, and modernization services for federal agencies, including ITSM, round-the-clock help desk, agile change management, and configuration management.

capabilities.description: IT sustainment, cybersecurity, RMF support, accreditation assistance, enhancement, and modernization services provided to federal agencies.
capabilities.evidence: XITM has a proven track record of providing IT sustainment, cybersecurity, RMF support, accreditation assistance, enhancement, and modernization services to federal agencies. Our help desk is a round-the-clock IT support buddy, operating 24/7 to keep client systems running seamlessly. Following the IT Service Management (ITSM) principles and the ITIL framework, we ensure each query is met with a swift and expert response. With DISA STIGs, we maintain compliance across environments.

capabilities.description: Training services including classroom or instructor-led training, hands-on/interactive methods, computer-based training (CBT), and online/e-learning; coverage includes Project Management, Information Technology, and Business Development.
capabilities.evidence: Training offerings include classroom or instructor-led sessions, hands-on interactive methods, CBT, and online/e-learning. The scope covers key areas such as Project Management, Information Technology, and Business Development, with Project Management training focusing on methodologies like PMP, Agile, and Scrum.

capabilities.description: XITM excels in business management services, focusing on requirement development, use case modeling, and business process modeling.
capabilities.evidence: XITM excels in business management services, focusing on requirement development, use case modeling, and business process modeling.
